title: Philips Selfie Straightener (HP8302/06)
description: Straighten and style your hair with this easy to use Philips HP8302/00 Selfie Straightener. With silkpro care technology and advanced keratin ceramic coating, the plates of this straighter are smoother than silk, resulting in less heat exposure and minimal friction. 210 degree C professional styling temperature gives you that perfect look like you've just come from the salon.
how_to_use: Warranty: 2 years Philips India warranty from the date of purchase
